GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.17.2
GSD.description:
ASoC: rockchip: Fix PM usage reference of rockchip_i2s_tdm_resume

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 5c1834aac759ddfd0f17c9f38db1b30adc8eb4e8, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 081068fd641403994f0505e6b91e021d3925f348. For more details please see the references link.
